// Returns a random integer between min (included) and max (included) function getRandom(min, max) { return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max + 1 - min)) + min; } var count = getRandom(3, 10), rooms = new Array(count); for (var i = 0; i < count; i++) { rooms[i] = { x: getRandom(100, 2500), z: getRandom(100, 2500), height: getRandom(50, 500) }; }; var girls = [{ x: 1200, z: 500, image: 'images/happy-girl.png' }, { x: 1700, z: 1700, image: 'images/mad-girl.png' }, { x: 2100, z: 600, image: 'images/in-a-band-girl.png' }, { x: 790, z: 1100, image: 'images/kick-it-girl.png' }];
